category.title: Best Design
category.description: Awarded to the most usable and best looking user interface
contents: Adobe Creative Cloud subscriptions for each member

category.title: Most Creative Idea
category.description: The project that has the most original idea or reinvention

sponsor.title: Best Startup Potential
sponsor.description: The project that offers the most innovative solution through experimentation, iterative learning and discovery
contents: A place in Wade Institute's upcoming Startup Sprint Bootcamp for each team member. Startup Sprint is the ultimate weekend to road test your entrepreneurial game! Get a taste for the fundamental steps of building a startup and meet your future cofounder.

sponsor.title: #Beautiful
sponsor.description: One of the guiding principles in software development at Xero is #beautiful; which not only represents the interface design and user experience but throughout the building of the software from the elegance of simplicity to the enjoyment of maintenance and enhancement.
contents: JB Hi-Fi gift vouchers and Xero merch

sponsor.title: Best IoT Hack
contents: 145-piece computer toolkits for each team member
Bosch hardware pack for each team member

sponsor.title: Open Source, Open Spirit
sponsor.description: The team who wins Open Source, Open Spirit will embody the open collaboration that developers all over the world use to build creative solutions.
contents: GitHub swag packs for each team member

sponsor.title: #Community
sponsor.description: For a solution addressing a Community need whilst aligning to our Core Values: Customer Focus, Passion, Collaboration, Empowerment, Transparency, and Integrity
contents: $100 Prepaid Visa Gift Card for each team member
